name: Forestmari
description:
Forestmari was made in 3 hours for Trijam 158.  Theme: Force of nature.

Unfortunately I didn't have time to add sfx and music, but at least the game is playable. I'll make a post-jam version that is a little bit more polished at some point.

Goal

Get as big as you can in 1 minute! Post your best scores in the comments. :)

How to play
  • Move - WASD / ARROW KEYS
  • Look around - Move mouse left/right

(I didn't get Restart to work so you have to restart the game for now.)

Check out the timelapse -->
